oc new-project release-pipeline
oc new-build --image-stream=openshift/jboss-eap70-openshift:1.7 --name=eap-web --binary=true
oc start-build eap-web --from-dir=/opt/OpenShift/ocp-release-pipeline-sample/ocp
oc new-app eap-web
oc expose svc/eap-messaging
oc get route



--
# In Order to allow jenkins pipeline to start new build in OCP

oc create serviceaccount jenkins
oc policy add-role-to-user edit system:serviceaccount:release-pipeline:jenkins -n release-pipeline
oc serviceaccounts get-token jenkins -n release-pipeline
